SELECT RNUM AS "seq", NTC_NO AS "ntcNo", USER_ID AS "userId", NTC_TTL AS "ntcTtl", NTC_INQ_CNT AS "ntcInqCnt", NTC_WRT_DATE AS "ntcWrtDate" FROM( SELECT NTC_NO, NTC_TTL, NTC_INQ_CNT, NTC_WRT_DATE, NTC_PRY, USER_ID, ROWNUM as RNUM
FROM( SELECT n.NTC_NO, n.NTC_TTL, n.NTC_INQ_CNT, n.NTC_WRT_DATE, n.NTC_PRY, u.USER_ID FROM NOTICE n, USERS u WHERE n.user_no = u.user_no ORDER BY n.ntc_pry desc ) WHERE ROWNUM <=#{endRowNo} ) WHERE rnum >=#{startRowNo}
mapper.insert:
SELECT ntcno_seq.nextval FROM dual
INSERT INTO NOTICE( NTC_NO, USER_NO, NTC_TTL, NTC_CN, NTC_INQ_CNT, NTC_WRT_DATE, NTC_PRY) VALUES( ntcno_seq.nextval, #{userNo}, #{ntcTtl}, #{ntcCn}, 0, sysdate, #{ntcPry} )
INSERT INTO NTC_FILE( NTC_FILE_NO, NTC_NO, NTC_FILE_PHYS_NM, NTC_FILE_ACTL_NM, NTC_FILE_EXTN_NM) VALUES(ntcFileNo_seq.nextval, #{ntcNo}+1, #{ntcFilePhysNm}, #{ntcFileActlNm}, #{ntcFileExtnNm})
mapper.select: SELECT n.NTC_TTL AS ntcTtl, n.NTC_NO AS ntcNo, u.USER_ID AS userId, n.NTC_INQ_CNT AS ntcInqCnt, n.NTC_WRT_DATE AS ntcWrtDate, n.NTC_CN AS ntcCn FROM NOTICE n LEFT OUTER JOIN USERS u ON n.USER_NO = u.USER_NO WHERE n.NTC_NO = #{ntcNo}

SELECT NTC_FILE_NO AS "ntcFileNo", NTC_NO AS "ntcNo", NTC_FILE_PHYS_NM AS "ntcFilePhysNm", NTC_FILE_ACTL_NM AS "ntcFileActlNm", NTC_FILE_EXTN_NM AS "ntcFileExtnNm" FROM NTC_FILE WHERE NTC_NO = #{ntcNo}

SELECT NTC_FILE_NO AS "ntcFileNo", NTC_NO AS "ntcNo", NTC_FILE_PHYS_NM AS "ntcFilePhysNm", NTC_FILE_ACTL_NM AS "ntcFileActlNm", NTC_FILE_EXTN_NM AS "ntcFileExtnNm" FROM NTC_FILE WHERE NTC_FILE_NO = #{ntcFileNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NTC_FILE( NTC_FILE_NO, NTC_NO, NTC_FILE_PHYS_NM, NTC_FILE_ACTL_NM, NTC_FILE_EXTN_NM) VALUES(#{ntcFileNo}, #{ntcNo}, #{ntcFilePhysNm}, #{ntcFileActlNm}, #{ntcFileExtnNm})
mapper.select: SELECT nc.NTC_CMNT_NO AS "ntcCmntNo", nc.NTC_NO AS "ntcNo", u.USER_ID AS "userId", nc.NTC_CMNT_CN AS "ntcCmntCn", nc.NTC_CMNT_DATE AS "ntcCmntDate" FROM NOTICE ntc, NTC_COMMENT nc, USERS u WHERE ntc.NTC_NO = nc.NTC_NO AND ntc.USER_NO = u.USER_NO AND nc.NTC_No = #{ntcNo} ORDER BY NTC_CMNT_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NTC_COMMENT(NTC_CMNT_NO, NTC_NO, USER_NO, NTC_CMNT_CN, NTC_CMNT_DATE) VALUES(NTCCMNTNO_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{ntcNo},#{userNo},#{ntcCmntCn},sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM, NTC_CMNT_NO AS "ntcCmntNo", NTC_NO AS "ntcNo", USER_NO AS "userNo", NTC_CMNT_CN AS "ntcCmntCn", NTC_CMNT_DATE AS "ntcCmntDate" FROM( SELECT ROWNUM, nc.NTC_CMNT_NO, nc.NTC_NO, u.USER_NO, nc.NTC_CMNT_CN, nc.NTC_CMNT_DATE FROM NTC_COMMENT nc, NOTICE ntc, USERS u WHERE ntc.NTC_NO = nc.NTC_NO AND ntc.USER_NO = u.USER_NO ORDER BY NTC_CMNT_NO DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
